channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Guardium Cloud Key Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Guardium Cloud Key Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-26270|2024-10-02T14:30:21.614Z -- ibm -- guardium%20cloud%20key%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (IBM Guardium Cloud Key Manager (GCKM) 1.10.3)) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an angular template injection flaw. By sending specially crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 248119.

item.title: CVE-2023-26271|2024-10-02T14:34:22.360Z -- ibm -- guardium%20cloud%20key%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (IBM Guardium Cloud Key Manager (GCKM) 1.10.3)) uses an inadequate account lockout setting that could allow a remote attacker to brute force account credentials. IBM X-Force ID: 248126.

item.title: CVE-2023-26272|2024-10-02T13:54:15.565Z -- ibm -- guardium%20cloud%20key%20manager
item.description: IBM Security Guardium Data Encryption (IBM Guardium Cloud Key Manager (GCKM) 1.10.3)) could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 248133.
